Understory | Embedded Engineer, Location manager, Data Scientist, ME | Somerville, MA, remote

Understory—named for the area in a rainforest beneath the forest canopy—creates hardware and analytics around rain, hail, wind and other weather events directly at the earth’s surface, where the risk to life and property is greatest. While traditional, radar-enabled weather centers collect data by analyzing conditions observed in the atmosphere, Understory’s ground-truth-based detection is a marked enhancement in both resolution and fidelity, which leads to better insight and early detection of risks.

You can get a glimpse of our hail gun that we use to test our stations on our recent press -- http://t.co/ECOgpk8ITM
